name: Jhon Mecqler
comment: This bike is Amazing.I use this bike after 6 month.This bike looking very nice.Everything is okey but price is very high

name: Abrahum Linkon
comment: Best features are it's capabilities as a bobber and as a toured or even a stylish commuter. The reliability of its engine if serviced regularly is on a par in my mind with Honda and Yamaha. I have recommended these bikes to many a friend.

name: The Rock
comment: I love the smooth acceleration of the massive V twin 106 cubic inch engine with the 6 speed gear box. My only dislike is if you put the hammer down a little too much the gear change isn't a smooth and quite clunky.

name: Phil West
comment: The Judge is a surprisingly engaging and fun bike to ride. It's not a sedate cruiser, it has attitude and can surprise plenty of people on country roads. Although it's a heavy bike the thumping great engine makes light work of moving all that weight in a swift fashion.

name: MCN Staff
comment: I paid $8000 with my trade and I don't believe I got a great deal but I believe I got a great bike. I picked it up April 14, 2016 and today December 2018 I have 17000 miles. I'm 72 and feel like 18 again.

name: johnsmail
comment: Had bike for a year, never worried about single front disc, brakes fine. Does tend to ground cornering too fast but you get used to that. Previously had the Vegas 8 ball and prior to that a string of Kawasaki cruisers. Love the bike.

name: Jon Abrahum
comment: Regularly serviced by a Indian, Victory mechanic with an oil change twice yearly. With using premium 98 obtain with Iridium spark plugs I safe due to the increased mileage.
